name: Puma Cat - The Paranormal Psychic Detective - A Brainwashed Winter
name_original: Puma Cat - The Paranormal Psychic Detective - A Brainwashed Winter
description:
Puma Cat, the paranormal psychic detective’s second adventure!  Ghosts have possessed Father Winter and his elves. They want to put an end to cold winters and take over the world!  This has become Cursemas Eve! Can you use Puma Cat’s psychic blasts to free the ghosts from Father Winter and his elves?  Can you defeat the cursed Father Winter?

Made for Butterscotch Shenijam 2019!

  • Main chosen theme: Cursemas Eve
  • Subthemes for fun:
    • Franchise: This game is a direct sequel to Puma Cat 1, my first game jam game for a jamDNA, not Shenanijam.  I used base assets(like the main character and book page blank backgrounds) and improved code, and made all new enemy sprites.  Both games play and feel so much better now!
    • Healthy Living:  I got full 8 hours of sleep and ate lots of healthy Korean food!
    • Tis the season: This game takes place in winter.
    • Maverick: I’m a solo act~

I’m glad this game jam motivated me to make a sequel.  Puma Cat 1 was in a jam with only about 6 entries, therefore I didn’t get much feedback and not many people played it.  Also, because I was able to learn new things and make the core mechanics better I was able to update Puma Cat 1 to be a better experience too!If you enjoyed this game please check out Puma Cat 1: The Ghost here: https://neatgames.itch.io/puma-cat-the-paranormal-psychic-detective

I look forward to playing all the games and leaving feedback, I hope I receive a lot as well!
